<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## ICreateVerifiablePresentationArgs interface

Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICreateVerifiablePresentationArgs
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                            | Type                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [presentation](./credential-w3c.icreateverifiablepresentationargs.presentation.md)                  | Partial&lt;PresentationPayload&gt;                   | The json payload of the Presentation according to the [canonical model](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations).The signer of the Presentation is chosen based on the <code>holder</code> property of the <code>presentation</code>'@context', 'type' and 'issuanceDate' will be added automatically if omitted |
| [proofFormat](./credential-w3c.icreateverifiablepresentationargs.proofformat.md)                    | [EncodingFormat](./credential-w3c.encodingformat.md) | The desired format for the VerifiablePresentation to be created. Currently, only JWT is supported                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [removeOriginalFields?](./credential-w3c.icreateverifiablepresentationargs.removeoriginalfields.md) | boolean                                              | <i>(Optional)</i> Remove payload members during JWT-JSON transformation. Defaults to <code>true</code>. See https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/\#jwt-encoding                                                                                                                                                              |
| [save?](./credential-w3c.icreateverifiablepresentationargs.save.md)                                 | boolean                                              | <i>(Optional)</i> If this parameter is true, the resulting VerifiablePresentation is sent to the [storage plugin](./core.idatastore.md) to be saved                                                                                                                                                                         |
